quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Martin and Avatar
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, zukos, martins. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In which episode of the Martin show does Martins mom, Mama Payne, make her first appearance?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Beauty and the Beast

questions.question: What does the character Jerome say every time he comes on screen on the sitcom Martin?

options.text: Jeromes in the House, I say Jeromes in the House
I Likes Me a Junk in the Trunk
It must be Jelly cause jam dont shake like that

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jeromes in the House, I say Jeromes in the House

questions.question: What is the name of Shenenehs hair salon in the TV series Martin?

options.text: Sheneneh Can ShoNuff Make You Look Fabulous

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Miguel Nunez

questions.question: In the animated series Avatar: The Last Airbender, Aang knows all of the elements.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tabasco sauce

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: David Alan Grier

options.text: William Petersen is the lead actor in both works

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Brides and Max Headroom
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, fiction, actor. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Max Headroom first appeared in 1984 as an announcer for a music video program called the Max Talking Headroom Show.
In the Here Come The Brides TV show, what was the name of the saloon owner who was the ladies confidante?
The show Here Come the Brides aired from September 1968 until April of what year?
How did the character Max Headroom get his name?

options.text: In one of the original episodes, Mr. Headrooms memory capacity is expanded exponentially - hence, the name Max Headroom.
Max Headroom is a framing device, which refers to the maximum amount of space allowable between the top of a characters head, and the picture frame formed by the camera.
Max Headroom refers to the focal length of the camera lens used to photograph a character in a medium close - up shot.
In the original story, Edison Carter crashes into a traffic gate labeled: Max Headroom 2.3 meters.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: In the original story, Edison Carter crashes into a traffic gate labeled: Max Headroom 2.3 meters.

questions.question: The Bolt brothers from the Here Come the Brides show promised to bring one hundred marriageable women from Massachusetts to Seattle.  However, one man bet them that they couldnt make the ladies stay for one year. His first name was Aaron. What was his last name?
In the Stargate SG-1 science fiction TV series, the Ancients, who are known as the original architects of the Stargate network, were initially called Atlantians.
In the TV series Here Come the Brides, to what town in Massachusetts did the Bolt brothers go to recruit women to come to Seattle ?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: New Bedford

questions.question: When was the last episode of The O.C. aired?
What was the name of the theme song to Here Come the Brides?

options.text: Get Me to the Church on Time

questions.question: Was the image of Max Headroom completely computer generated?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Edison Carter

questions.question: What was the last name of the ships captain on the TV show Here Come the Brides?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He stuttered.

questions.question: Name the actor who provided the voice for Max Headroom.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Matt Frewer

questions.question: What soft drink did Max Headroom promote on television in the mid 1980s?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: New Coke

questions.question: What are blipverts, in the context of the 80s TV show Max Headroom?

options.text: An electronic censoring device on the TV show which deletes objectionable language.
Pulse sonar used in urban settings to track down villains - similar to GPS.
Subliminal audio messages embedded in Max Headrooms s-s-stuttering d-d-dialogue.
Ads on TV  which are flashed so quickly, the viewer is compelled to stare at the screen.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ads on TV  which are flashed so quickly, the viewer is compelled to stare at the screen.
